Name: Lumiland
About the game: Lumiland is a sokoban-like 3D puzzle game. Adventure through light and shadow, and push the crates to pave the way toward your goal! Seamless adventure through over 50 levels Solving the puzzles by combining the two characters’ unique abilities Stylized, delightful art style Original sound track by 希望索任合资 (T-L-S) Characters You meet Light first. They walk in the sunlight and like to find new crystal pieces. There is also Shadow who lives in shadow. Walking in light makes Shadow feel sick, but they can do it if they try hard! World In your journey through Lumiland, you will experience five different areas, each with its own art, music, and puzzle styles. Branching paths provide optional, more-challenging levels to really test your brain.
